column1: Main last departure airports and airlines to Sri Lanka, January 2023
Air connectivity is critical to the tourism industry in Sri Lanka, as shown by the analysis of
departure airports. Chart 3 reveals that 39% of tourists had last departed from airports in
Dubai, Doha and Chennai. Sri Lankan Airlines, Emirates and Qatar Airways were the most
popular airlines, handling 57% of the tourists to Sri Lanka. Dubai stood out as the main last
departure airport (19%), and Sri Lankan Airlines as the top main airline (33%).
